item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Fixed info.

Yeah I know. I JUST started learning HTML coding so that is what I have so far. I will add more and make it look better but I jsut wanted feedback on the set up so far.

Thanks for your critique. You have been Rep++'d.

UPDATE:

Halflive9, thanks it’s in wrong section so I highly doubt it will be approved but thanks!
You have been rep++'d!

item.title: THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT! Rep++ for all critiques!
item.dc:creator: @Jr_Satan Jr Satan
item.description:
@Jr_Satan wrote:

[quote=“JGX, post:1, topic:421282”]I am a regular member on this forum and I DO know this is the wrong section to post this in but I just need some critiques on what I have so far and this is the most active section on this forum so…

Please don’t flame about me posting this here.

If i get banned, or this is removed sorry to whoever removes it

[size=18pt]I need some critiques on my web page for my server.[/size]

I have the basic information page here:
http://www.oleanpk.tk
From there players can read all the basic info and go to the forum if they want.

I am offering a Rep++ for ANY critique, weather it be good, or bad.
If you think something should be added/changed/deleted, let me know on here!

[u][b]

IT IS NOT ONLINE AND WONT BE until ##/##/#### SO I AM NOT ADVERTISING IT![/b][/u][/quote]

by saying when it will be online thats advertising it lol and it looks boring with a white backround add something into the backround like an image or something make it look more inviting+interesting.

EDIT: Changed the quote so people cannot see the date you said >.<

Read full topic
